Tablogic

An IoT Platform designed
to collect data in working spaces.

About Tablogic

Tablogic is a Table IoT Platform designed to collect data in working spaces, using small sensory units attached to every seat.

Use the platform to track sound, presence, movement and temperature, and analyze the collected data using our online dashboard.

Tablogic is open-source. You may find our source code and design spec below.

Visit our Dashboard

You can visit a preview Dashboard to experience our data visualization and processing tools.

Visit Dashboard

Contact Tablogic

You're welcome to reach out to us as we continuously develop the product, and you're welcome to fork the source code for your own use.

  • Github
  • Email



Tablogic is a technological prototype

that was created by students of the Media Innovation Lab

of the School of Communication of IDC Herzliya.

Visit us at: http://milab.idc.ac.il
